item.title: MMM
item.description: score:77 Chances: 3M’s prospects are improving, with the recent completion of the spin-off of its healthcare business, allowing the company to focus more on its core businesses. Investors applauded the spin-off of the healthcare business, indicating positive sentiment towards 3M’s strategic direction. The company’s settlement agreement with U.

item.title: CRWD
item.description: score:172 Chances: CrowdStrike (CRWD) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Shares of cybersecurity company CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley analyst Hamza Fodderwala upgraded the stock’s rating from Equal-Weight (Hold) to Overweight (Buy) and raised the price target from $203 to $304.
